reviews.text: Trowbridge is a quality town and never fails to entertain

Modern ticket office that has I believe had the hours extended, trains to Westbury and south and also towards Bristol and also extra services up to Chippenham and Swindon - 2 platforms, ticket machines on either side

Staff helpful - disabled access is over the footbridge

It is only a couple of minutes to the shopping centre 

Frequent service and is busy

Ok place if you want a similar feel to Chippenham. Shires is the go to shopping mall. Other than that town centre is a 10min walk away where you"ll find local shops such as Timpson and some family supermarkets. The high street banks are there as well. Town centre not so visually attractive as they're a lot of closed stores and it could do with a clean up.
Basic train station. For its size there's not a lot of covered seating and it's not very centrally located. GWR train service is abysmal, which doesn't help the atmosphere.

reviews.author_name: Maria Genoveva Huapaya Ramirez de Southgate
